x-code-samples.source:
curl -X POST "http://localhost:8000/api/createUser" 
    -d "first_name"="uiZPE4lc9lLnZB4X" \
    -d "last_name"="HYTl0f3QbTq6dphR" \
    -d "dob"="svf3SFjLPnyfVsla" \
    -d "weight"="16" \
    -d "ethnicity"="TaSNZ0SUykCfIyCs" \
    -d "gender"="RRDTOrzLKZn8Bmt2" \
    -d "email"="IsccwFphbNfgzkwi" \
    -d "phone"="r9KySG5UoBRq8dXN" \
    -d "password"="zBX8wf3xRGHy3kP0"

post.operationId:
Authenticate User
Create a usable token for the logged in user

x-code-samples.source:
curl -X POST "http://localhost:8000/api/authenticateUser" 
    -d "email"="oChkoE4YLXo2fwVD" \
    -d "password"="QCWtnoVg1fInkcEC"

curl -X PUT "http://localhost:8000/api/updateUser/{id}" 
    -d "first_name"="aqrTFr4nKyWdZD8Y" \
    -d "last_name"="0CXXxrKuiXBtUgsj" \
    -d "dob"="hu6D89iUshueE9yI" \
    -d "weight"="11" \
    -d "ethnicity"="rYu7UNUlkA4zbFe3" \
    -d "gender"="1Utdi0FDnb3HqopQ" \
    -d "phone"="PXWaGzZLn2noFEbZ" \
    -d "password"="wLMyNHs5xS0UbrRN"

curl -X POST "http://localhost:8000/api/setBloodGroup/{id}" 
    -d "bloodGroup"="jRvoHkQrb8U9b8YH"

curl -X POST "http://localhost:8000/api/sendBloodDonorRequest" 
    -d "recepient_id"="11" \
    -d "max_acceptance_no"="11" \
    -d "metadata"="NqtyIBfYguP11GEG"

curl -X POST "http://localhost:8000/api/acceptBloodDonorRequest" 
    -d "recepient_id"="13" \
    -d "request_id"="3" \
    -d "acceptor_id"="15"
curl -X GET -G "http://localhost:8000/api/getUserNotifications/{id}"
curl -X GET -G "http://localhost:8000/api/getNotificationDetails/{id}"
curl -X GET -G "http://localhost:8000/api/readNotification/{id}"
